Description:
We are hiring a Facility Manager(Riyadh) to manage a large property, and maintenance/technical staff to effectively maintain all property facilities, equipment, and property.Based in Riyadh, you will be responsible for the safe and efficient maintenance of the large property through proper supervision and management of maintenance and technical service staff. Capable of rapid decision-making and must be able to solve complex maintenance problems. The Facility Manager will be responsible for keeping buildings properly maintained, clean, and safe.The role combines management tasks such as supervising contractors and more strategic responsibilities such as managing budgets and advising on long-term energy efficiency. Typical duties include:Overseeing and agreeing on contracts and providers for services including security, parking, cleaning, catering, and IT.
Supervising teams of staff including cleaning, maintenance, and security.
Ensuring that basic facilities, such as water and heating, are well-maintained.
Managing maintenance and staffing budgets.
Ensuring that facilities meet government regulations, health and security standards and energy efficiency requirements.
Overseeing building projects and renovationsSkills
